text:
@WhiteHouse @SecretaryCarson Right, Trump and the White House had only two jobs. Inform the people of the severity of the pandemic and secure PPEs

Trump got neither task right now we have mass graves in NYC and 100,000 dead in 9 weeks that Republicans are amplifying as a victory over Coronavirus.
